Accessibility Features

⌨️

Full Keyboard Navigation

Navigate our entire site using just your keyboard with intuitive shortcuts and visible focus indicators.

🔍

Screen Reader Support

Compatible with popular screen readers and includes detailed ARIA labels and live announcements.

🎨

High Contrast Mode

Automatically adapts to your system's high contrast settings for better visibility.

Keyboard Shortcuts

Tab Navigate between elements
Enter Activate buttons and links
Esc Close dialogs and menus
/ Quick search
import { Component, OnInit, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { isDropdownOpen = false; selectedOption = ''; currentAnnouncement = 'Welcome to our accessible website! Press "/" to use quick search.'; constructor(private router: Router) {} ngOnInit() { // Show initial announcement for 5 seconds setTimeout(() => { if (this.currentAnnouncement.includes('Welcome')) { this.currentAnnouncement = ''; } }, 5000); } @HostListener('window:keydown', ['$event']) handleKeyboardEvent(event: KeyboardEvent) { // Quick search shortcut if (event.key === '/' && !this.isDropdownOpen) { event.preventDefault(); this.currentAnnouncement = 'Quick search activated'; // Implement quick search functionality here } // Escape key handling if (event.key === 'Escape') { if (this.isDropdownOpen) { this.toggleDropdown(); } if (this.currentAnnouncement) { this.dismissAnnouncement(); } } } dismissAnnouncement(): void { this.currentAnnouncement = ''; } navigateToProducts(): void { this.router.navigate(['/products']); } toggleDropdown(): void { this.isDropdownOpen = !this.isDropdownOpen; // Announce to screen readers this.announceToScreenReader( this.isDropdownOpen ? 'Dropdown menu opened' : 'Dropdown menu closed' ); } selectOption(option: string): void { this.selectedOption = option; this.isDropdownOpen = false; this.announceToScreenReader(`Selected option: ${option}`); } private announceToScreenReader(message: string): void { const announcement = document.createElement('div'); announcement.setAttribute('aria-live', 'polite'); announcement.setAttribute('class', 'sr-only'); announcement.textContent = message; document.body.appendChild(announcement); setTimeout(() => document.body.removeChild(announcement), 1000); } // Close dropdown when clicking outside onDocumentClick(event: MouseEvent): void { if (!(event.target as HTMLElement).closest('.custom-dropdown')) { this.isDropdownOpen = false; } } }
